parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Wakefield, South Australia, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: north and east of Adelaide; it includes the centres of Balaklava, Clare, Craigmore, Elizabeth, Freeling, Gawler, Kapunda, Mallala, Munno Parra, Riverton, Tarlee, Virginia and Williamstown, and parts of Salisbury and Port Wakefield.
Industries: commercial, retail and technology-based industry, defence, Edinburgh RAAF Base, automotive manufacturing, cereal crops, sheep, cattle, market gardens and viticulture.
State electorates: Wakefield includes the South Australian Legislative Assembly electorates of Light and Napier, and parts of Frome, Goyder, Little Para, Ramsay, Schubert, Stuart and Taylor.
